National Director, Americas: Startup Grind | Connector
September 11, 2014, Christie worked with Tim but at different companies

Tim is truly a stand-up guy.  His passion and tenacity are obvious, his concept and company are exciting and his integrity is the icing on the cake. I've had the pleasure of working with him and his tool, Crowd Mics, at my Startup Grind events. I look forward to seeing where they go with this company.  It's always a pleasure to see good people who work hard have their dreams pay off.

Rod Weiss
Director of External Relations - Coleman University
September 26, 2012, Rod managed Tim directly

Managed Tim for nearly a year in 2011 and 2012 at Kryterion Inc.  Tim was in demand due to his prompt agility and diplomacy with clients. He projected calm confidence introducing (via the latest in web collaborative tools) early releases of Software-As-A-Service products.  Tim brought value each day of new product management adding aesthetic appeal in presentations offered to worldwide clients.  Besides serving as a caring, confident, polished communicator in product demonstrations, Tim showed excellence in new product research.  Tim became our expert on SalesForce, and saved technical support dollars by producing libraries of video tutorials.  Tim is multi-lingual and proficient in multi-operating systems and device platform expertise.  Able to simplify the complex while capturing and reporting client opinions.   I would recommend hiring Tim to anyone.

Christie Simmons
National Director, Americas: Startup Grind | Connector
September 11, 2014, Tim worked with Christie but at different companies

Christie is a great Director for Startup Grind in Phoenix. She is incredibly well organized and pulls of a great event month after month. Christie is able to connect with and schedule great entrepreneurs and business professionals who provide real value to the startup community. Her calm and positive demeanor make for great interviews. I will continue to enjoy Startup Grind under Christie's leadership.

summary: Crowd Mics is my passion! We're powering audience interaction by turning phones into wireless microphones. Grinding my face off to bring this to the world!
